verses.roman:
vātsalya-āveśe kaila kaumqāra saphala
paugaṇḍa saphala kaila lañā sakhāvala

synonyms: vātsalya—of parental love; āveśe—in the attachment; kaila—made; kaumāra—childhood; sa-phala—fruitful; paugaṇḍa—boyhood; sa-phala—fruitful; kaila—made; lañā—taking along; sakhā-āvala—friends.
translation: Parental affection made His childhood fruitful. His boyhood was successful with His friends.
